_instructions: This is an alternative JSON format for questions.
You can load this file instead of using the Dart questions.dart
To add a question: Copy an existing object and modify it
Each question needs: id (unique number), question (text), category

questions.question: How much money would you spend on a first date? (in €)
How much do you spend on groceries per week? (in €)
What's the maximum you'd pay for a concert ticket? (in €)
How much money do you save per month? (in €)
What's the most you've ever spent on a single clothing item? (in €)
How many hours do you sleep per night on average?
How many times per week do you exercise?
How many hours of screen time do you have per day?
How many alarms do you set in the morning?
How many minutes does it take you to get ready in the morning?
How many cups of coffee/tea do you drink per day?
How many times per week do you eat fast food?
How many glasses of water do you drink per day?
How many times per month do you order food delivery?
How many slices of pizza can you eat in one sitting?
How many close friends do you have?
How many parties have you been to this year?
How many times per week do you text your best friend?
How many people would you invite to your birthday party?
How many minutes late do you usually arrive to meetings?
How many hours per day do you spend on work/studies?
How many sick days have you taken this year?
How many emails do you receive per day on average?
How many meetings do you have per week?
How many hours per week do you spend playing video games?
How many TV series are you currently watching?
How many books do you read per year?
How many movies have you watched in the last month?
How many hours per day do you spend on social media?
How many songs are in your favorite playlist?
